body_html: re: @kbsriram's point about missing Python utilities, for SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogitsGrad, you can skip the tensor_util.constant_value() call and leave a TODO to implement it in C++. This is OK in this case since the IsZero() check is an optimization anyway (I think...).
body_text: re: @kbsriram's point about missing Python utilities, for SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogitsGrad, you can skip the tensor_util.constant_value() call and leave a TODO to implement it in C++. This is OK in this case since the IsZero() check is an optimization anyway (I think...).
body: re: @kbsriram's point about missing Python utilities, for SoftmaxCrossEntropyWithLogitsGrad, you can skip the tensor_util.constant_value() call and leave a TODO to implement it in C++. This is OK in this case since the IsZero() check is an optimization anyway (I think...).
